CustomField.formula: IF( AND( N26_Promotion__r.ATM_Fee_Discount__c>0, Promotion_Start_Date__c <= TODAY() , Promotion_End_Date__c >= TODAY()), N26_Product__r.ATM_Fee_in_Other_Currencies__c-N26_Product__r.ATM_Fee_in_Other_Currencies__c*N26_Promotion__r.ATM_Fee_Discount__c, N26_Product__r.ATM_Fee_in_Other_Currencies__c)
CustomField.label: ATM Fee in Other Currencies
